CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aether Corp relative to Luminara Solutions?
SRP.A: Aether Corp is {below} Luminara Solutions in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Luminara Solutions relative to Starburst Enterprises?
SRP.A: Luminara Solutions is {above} Starburst Enterprises in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Starburst Enterprises relative to Aether Corp?
SRP.A: Starburst Enterprises is {below} Aether Corp in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total r&d investment?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Starburst Enterprises}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total r&d investment?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Luminara Solutions}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Starburst Enterprises's maximum R&D Investment in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Starburst Enterprises's maximum R&D Investment is in {1980}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Aether Corp's minimum R&D Investment in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Aether Corp's minimum R&D Investment is in {1965}.

NC.Q: Between 1973 and 1979, did the total R&D Investment experience a larger or smaller change than between 1969 and 1975?
NC.A: The change in total r&d investment between 1973 and 1979 was {smaller} than between 1969 and 1975.

NC.Q: Between 1965 and 1969, did the total R&D Investment experience a larger or smaller change than between 1967 and 1979?
NC.A: The change in total r&d investment between 1965 and 1969 was {smaller} than between 1967 and 1979.

NC.Q: Was the total R&D Investment in 1966 higher or lower than in 1973?
NC.A: The total r&d investment in 1966 was {lower} than in 1973.

NC.Q: Between 1971 and 1979, was the average total R&D Investment higher or lower than between 1977 and 1980?
NC.A: The average total r&d investment between 1971 and 1979 was {lower} than between 1977 and 1980.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Starburst Enterprises} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Starburst Enterprises and Aether Corp first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Starburst Enterprises and Aether Corp first exchanged leading positions in {1966}.
